title: High Reliance on Banks for Business Financing
description: In 2023, 64.5% of firms in Peru used banks to finance their working capital, indicating a strong reliance on formal financial institutions for business operations.

title: Low Percentage of Trained Primary School Teachers
description: As of 2023, only 13.09% of primary school teachers in Peru were trained, highlighting a significant gap in educational quality and teacher preparedness.
